snippet.title: Critic's notebook: Pandora radio let me down
snippet.description: The problem I had with Pandora: I wanted to listen to Benjamin Britten. And it wouldn't let me.

snippet.title: Washington's classical music season for fall 2012
snippet.description: A listing of classical music events for fall 2012.

snippet.title: Readers' classical rediscoveries
snippet.description: Responding to Anne Midgette's story about neglected composers' works being rediscovered, readers wrote in with their own rediscoveries, from Alkan to Zemlinsky.

snippet.title: Readers' rediscoveries
snippet.description: In response to my article about neglected composers, readers wrote, Tweeted, and posted on Facebook with their own suggestions of composers you may not have heard of who are worth a listen.

snippet.title: Pianist Marc-Andre Hamelin played an intimate and engaging concert
snippet.description: Marc-Andre Hamelin brings fireworks with feeling to a recital juxtaposing the music of Chopin with his less-known coeval Alkan, presented by Pro Musica Hebraica.

snippet.title: D.C. community calendar, March 29 to April 5, 2012
snippet.description: Concerts, theater, museum programs and other events.

snippet.title: Spring preview: Hitting the right classical notes
snippet.description: Anne Midgette picks out the noteworthy events on Washington's classical music scene this spring

snippet.title: Spring preview -- Theater: 'Astro Boy,' 'Brother Russia' and 2 'Shrews'
